attributes.action: sack all members of parliment and have national elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for all hard working normal people its time to get rid of the parasites that are goverment and opposition, you are all in the job for greed and personal gain

you are all a disgrace to hard working people

rejection.details: The Prime Minister does not have the authority to sack all MPs.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
